testcase.name: Test scenario one -Cluno get all offers and verify the available set to true for all offers
testcase.system-out: Given fetch the "https://api.cluno.com/offerservice/v1/offer" for the cluno with the endpoint "/query".passed And Execute the webservice for the get method...............................passed Then verify the response code and response with available set to true for all offers.passed

testcase.name: Test scenario two - Cluno get all offers and verify the fuel type or emmission label and environmentFriendly
testcase.system-out: Given fetch the "https://api.cluno.com/offerservice/v1/offer" for the cluno with the endpoint "/query".passed And Execute the webservice for the get method...............................passed Then verify the response code and response if environmentFriendly is true only for cars with fuelType electric or Hybrid or with emissionLabel A.passed

testcase.name: Test Scenario three - Cluno get all offers and verify the isAvailableAtShortNotice and estimatedDeliveryTime
testcase.system-out: Given fetch the "https://api.cluno.com/offerservice/v1/offer" for the cluno with the endpoint "/query".passed And Execute the webservice for the get method...............................passed Then verify the response code and response for all offers if isAvailableAtShortNotice is set to true and verify the estimatedDeliveryTime as "innerhalb von 2 Wochen" for the same.passed

testcase.name: Test scenario four -Cluno get specific offers and verify the isAvailableAtShortNotice and estimatedDeliveryTime
testcase.system-out: Given fetch the "https://api.cluno.com/offerservice/v1/offer" for the cluno with the endpoint "/117".passed And Execute the webservice for the get method...............................passed Then verify the response code and response if isAvailableAtShortNotice is set to true and verify the estimatedDeliveryTime as "innerhalb von 2 Wochen" for the same.passed

testcase.name: Test scenario two - Cluno get all offers and verify the fuel type or emmission label and environmentFriendly
testcase.system-out: Given fetch the "https://api.cluno.com/offerservice/v1/offer" for the cluno with the endpoint "/117".passed And Execute the webservice for the get method...............................passed Then verify the response code for specific offer and response if environmentFriendly is true only for cars with fuelType electric or Hybrid or with emissionLabel A.passed
